attributes.action: Support the Sydney declaration and ensure that, of Britain's funding to end the HIV/AIDS epidemic, at least 10% is dedicated solely to research and to encourage other donors similarly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For every person put onto therapy for HIV, another 6 are infected. Without new technologies, drugs and methods to contain the HIV/AIDS epidemic we will fail in this crucial humanitarian challenge.

At the 4th IAS conference in Sydney, a motion has been passed urging governments and donors to ensure 10% of all money spent on HIV/AIDS goes towards the research necessary for these new approaches.

We call on the Prime Minister to ensure that the UKs funding of aid for the epidemic conforms with the criteria of the Sydney declaration, and so use his influence to further this approach to boosting HIV research.
